itunes:title: The Snow Queen (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Elizabeth Grace. Watch the northern lights dance overhead as Gerda journeys to find a palace of ice in this sleepy retelling of Hans Christian Andersen's classic fairy tale, "The Snow Queen."
